basic_info.description:
I'm Olli Paloviita, a software engineer from Finland. I am currently finalizing master's degree studies at Aalto University, and looking for a thesis position.

I have a very wide range of skills in different technologies and I have several years of experience in professional software development. I am interested in real-time communication, security, algorithms and cloud computing. I like to bring new ideas forward and I enjoy learning new skills. I am a team player who wants to help and learn from others.
